name: list_routing_numbers
description: You can use this API to confirm if a routing number is valid, such as when a user is providing you with bank account details. Since routing numbers uniquely identify a bank, this will always return 0 or 1 entry. In Sandbox, the only valid routing number for this method is 110000000.

cursor.description: Return the page of entries after this one.

limit.description: Limit the size of the list that is returned. The default (and maximum) is 100 objects.

routing_number.description: Filter financial institutions by routing number.

$block: A list of Routing Number objects

$ul: **next_cursor**: A pointer to a place in the list.
